GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with an object of specific id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, with the body property removed, a comment_count added and in descending order of created_at key

articles.author: butter_bridge
articles.title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
